name: @sassy-js/fire
description: Sassy Fire is a powerful library of tools designed to help you build sleek and stylish applications with Firebase. With Sassy Fire, you can create dynamic, scalable, and performant apps that are sure to impress your users.

scripts.release:version: npm version patch && npm run release:migrate
scripts.release:prepare: npm run build && npm run release:version
scripts.release: npm run release:prepare && cd dist && npm publish --access=public && cd .. && npm run release:tags
